newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Jusco reports satisfactory Xmas sale.
newsitem.headline: Jusco reports satisfactory Xmas sale.

text.p: Jusco Stores (Hong Kong) Co said on Thursday it recorded double digit growth in sales during the Christmas period, with fashion and household items registering substantial increases of 20 percent and 15 percent, respectively, compared with the previous year.

"Besides, the recent recovery of property and stock markets has stimulated consumer spendings during the Christmas period, which led to a satisfactory sales increase over last year," managing director Tatsuichi Yamaguchi said in a statement.
The company did not give any sales figures.
